      • _get

        public org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.AbstractTransformProvider.Iterable<TexHyphenator> _get(org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.Query query)
        Recognized features: - hyphenator: Will only match if the value is `tex' or `texhyph'. - table: A tex table is a URI that is either a file name, a file path relative to a registered tablepath, an absolute file URI, or a fully qualified table identifier. Only URIs that point to LaTeX pattern files (ending with ".tex") are matched. The `table' feature is not compatible with `locale'. - locale: Matches only hyphenators with that locale. No other features are allowed.
        Specified by:
        _get in class org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common.AbstractTransformProvider<TexHyphenator>
